room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Had a great time with our party of 8 exploring and escaping the theatre! Definitely looking forward to checking out the other rooms in the future.

room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: With three family generations, we thoroughly enjoyed escaping from The Theater. The puzzles were clever and Kennedy was as a great host!

room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I loved it. This was my first experience with an Escape Room and it exceeded my expectations. There were many clues to find and solve allowing a group of people to all be busy! I recommend.
